boomi-integration-guide.title: Connect SAP SuccessFactors to SFTP
boomi-integration-guide.description: Connect SAP SuccessFactors to SFTP with Error Handling is a robust integration solution within the Boomi platform, focusing on integrating data from SuccessFactors to an SFTP server while incorporating comprehensive error handling. Enhance your business operations by ensuring the accurate and timely transfer of employee data with efficient error notifications.
boomi-integration-guide.overview: This process systematically handles SuccessFactors data retrieval, transformation, and loading to an SFTP server, all while ensuring any errors encountered are promptly reported via email, ensuring no data transfer failures go unnoticed.

benefit.name: Reliability
benefit.description: Ensures data transfer processes are robust and dependable.

benefit.name: Transparency
benefit.description: Comprehensive error notifications keep stakeholders informed of any issues.

benefit.name: Efficiency
benefit.description: Automates data transformation and transfer, minimizing manual effort.

prerequisites.title: Before You Begin
prerequisites.description: Ensure you have all necessary credentials and permissions to access SuccessFactors and SFTP. Familiarity with Boomi's process building and document property handling will be beneficial.

connection.title: SuccessFactors Connection
connection.description: To configure a SuccessFactors connector within Boomi, navigate to the Connections Tab of a SuccessFactors Connection component and follow these steps:

parameter.name: URL
parameter.description: The endpoint URL of the SuccessFactors API.

parameter.name: User
parameter.description: The user name to log in to SuccessFactors. The user must have sufficient permissions to use the API and perform the necessary actions.

parameter.name: Password
parameter.description: The password to log in to SuccessFactors. Ensure you keep this secure and do not expose it in configurations.

included-processes.process: Connect SAP SuccessFactors to SFTP with Error Handling

main-process.name: Connect SAP SuccessFactors to SFTP with Error Handling
main-process.description: This main process retrieves employee data from SuccessFactors, performs necessary transformations, and then uploads the data to an SFTP server with error handling to ensure data integrity and process reliability.

step.name: Set Process MD
step.description: This step sets dynamic process properties required for logging and error notifications.

step.name: Error Notification
step.description: Configures the error message to be sent if an error occurs during processing.
step.content: HTML error message with process details.

step.name: Email Properties
step.description: Sets document properties for email notification.

step.name: Send Email
step.description: Sends the error email notification.

step.name: Query SuccessFactors
step.description: Queries employee data from SuccessFactors.

step.name: SFSF EmpEmployment to Canonical
step.description: Maps employee data from the SuccessFactors query to an Employee Canonical profile

step.name: Branch Step
step.description: Branches the process into three paths based on business rules applied to the employee data.
step.note: Each branch contains a reject if the Business Rule is not met
Branches two and three do not have rules currently set

step.name: Employee Canonical
step.description: Applies business rules to the employee data.

step.name: Map Step
step.description: Maps the transformed Employee Canonical data to the desired format.

step.name: Combine Documents
step.description: Combines document for further processing or uploading.

step.name: Document Properties Step
step.description: Sets document properties for the SFTP operation.

step.name: Upsert to SFTP
step.description: Uploads the data to SFTP server.

step.name: Stop Step
step.description: This terminates the branch process.

step.name: Filter
step.description: Applies filtering rules on the data.

step.name: Canonical Employee Profile Data to Kafka
step.description: Included are steps to prepare a payload to send to Kafka via the Kafka Connector. Avro Schema is set along with converting the profile from a JSON to a Avro Script

step.name: Filter
step.description: Applies filtering rules on the data.

step.name: Map Step
step.description: Maps filtered data to the desired structure.

step.name: Data Process Step
step.description: Combines document for uploading.

step.name: Document Properties Step
step.description: Sets document properties for SFTP upload.

step.name: Upsert to SFTP
step.description: Uploads the filtered data to SFTP server.

step.name: Stop Step
step.description: This terminates the branch processes
